Class ScrabbleController

java.lang.Object
ScrabbleController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class ScrabbleController extends Object implements ActionListener
Controller class for the Scrabble game with MVC pattern. It implements ActionListener to handle button clicks with Event Model. Middle point between the view and model.

  • Method Details

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
      This handles all the button click events from the view. It uses action commands to figure out which button was clicked
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface ActionListener
      Parameters:
      e - the action event

    • startGame

      public void startGame(int numPlayers, String[] playerNames)
      Now we start a new game with the given number of players
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - number of players from 2 to 4
      playerNames - is the array of player names

      private int parseColumn(String colStr)
      This parses a column of letter from A to O to a column from 0 to 14
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the column index or -1 if it does not work.
